Name: Neon Warrior
About the game: Neon Warrior is an action game with side view and puzzles. You will take on the role of a hero and make a journey full of dangers in a fantastic neon world. Main features: It will appeal to both beginners and seasoned gamers. Interesting achievements for completing levels. Atmospheric music. Endless rounds of ammunition.
